column1: These included twelve genes encoding ABC transport systems ( matE, BAB1 _ 0340; dctM, BAB1 _ 0372; fhuD, BAB1 _ 1366; yadH, BAB1 _ 1368; oppA, BAB1 _ 1601; oppC, BAB2 _ 1051; oppD, BAB2 _ 0817; potC, BAB1 _ 1624; ssuB, BAB2 _ 0917; ugpC, BAB2 _ 1143; BAB2 _ 0794; BAB2 _ 1139), ten genes related with carbohydrate, amino or fatty acids metabolism and five related with nitrogen metabolism.
